::Spears::

She smiled as he kissed her cheek. She leaned her head against his 
shoulder as he took her arm and walked to the bridge with 
him. "ANything that pleases you, master Prebon."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon was liking Spears' behaviour. Watching Spears kiss him must 
be 
> making Striker lose all hopee. Prebon eally had no interest in 
Spears 
> because he had a bot back home, but he would do anything to see 
bots 
> suffer. And on top of that, Spears didn't even realize that she was 
> hurting Striker.
> 
> "Yes, let us go to the bridge, so we can map out how to get 
Ramulus."
> 
> He kissed her on the cheek, laughin on the inside about Striker, 
took 
> her by the arm and started walking towards the bridge.
